item.title: U
item.description: score:-19 Chances: Unity Software Inc. has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2, reflecting growing optimism about the company’s earnings prospects. The metaverse market is predicted to surge to $507 billion by 2030, suggesting significant potential for Unity Software Inc. in this space.
